entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
